title: Citrus barbecue sauce for chicken
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 onions, chopped', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '320ml (11 fl oz) high quality orange juice', '1 dessertspoon mustard powder', '450g (16 oz) ketchup', '1 lemon, juiced', '7 tablespoons red wine', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
